node.title: Scrub fire on border of Otago and Southland contained
node.description: A scrub fire near Kingston has been contained.
node.content:
["A scrub fire near Kingston has been contained.", "", "
Two helicopters have been fighting the fire since first light (file picture). Photo: RNZ / Patrick Phelps
", "Fire and Emergency was alerted to the fire at 2.30am, but crews were initially unable to access it due to the terrain.", "Two helicopters and three crews from Kingston, Garston and Athol returned at first light to battle the blaze.", "A Fire and Emergency spokesperson said it burnt through seven hectares of scrub, but had now been contained and the crews had left the area.", "The spokesperson said no structures were threatened."]
